title: Picodia
description: Web-based app based on Picross with a new puzzle every day. See how long you can maintain your streak! Can you beat each daily puzzle with all three lives left?

title: E-State Mate Services
description: Florida-based real estate tech firm splitting web development talents and back-end property data visualization. Currently managing a growing team of developers as we grow!

title: Evening's Kingdom
description: React & MUI-based site for Paula Schmidt's fantasy series, Evening's Kingdom. By working with the author, we are adding marketing automation tools and analytics in the next update.

title: Postcart Shop
description: React & Material UI-based e-commerce shop for a potential business idea. Also leverages commerce.js and Stripe.

title: Star Wars Trivia
description: IT DIED! Unfortunately, the underlying data API is no more. Just leaving this up for posterity :). Single page app trivia game built on React and Node using the Star Wars API.

title: Old Portfolio
description: It was fun while it lasted, but this bare bones site no longer represents my skill level. Give it a look to see the progression.

title: Battle Maps
description: Learn more about the most influential battles in history using the Google Maps and Wikipedia APIs.

title: Chat App
description: Chat app built on Node.js with socket.io as the corresponding chat API.

title: Weather App
description: Pulls weather data based on user-input location from Weatherstack API.

title: HANSCycle: Senior Design
description: Created from a template in uni prior to any proper coding knowledge or experience. Our project ended up winning 'Most Innovative in Design' for FAMU-FSU's College of Engineering Design competition.
